title: Define the AI model architecture
description: Research and design the AI model that will create packaging designs with zero waste.

title: Develop biodegradable and recyclable materials database
description: Create a database of certified biodegradable and infinitely recyclable materials.

title: Design the user interface for AI model input
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to input packaging design specifications.

title: Develop an algorithm for zero waste packaging design
description: Create an algorithm that generates packaging designs with minimal waste using the provided materials database.
dependencies: Develop biodegradable and recyclable materials database

title: Implement AI model for packaging design
description: Integrate the developed algorithm into the AI model.
dependencies: Design the user interface for AI model input
Develop an algorithm for zero waste packaging design

title: Test and refine AI model performance
description: Perform tests to ensure the AI model consistently generates effective zero waste packaging designs.
dependencies: Implement AI model for packaging design

title: Document the project and AI model functionality
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the project and its features.
dependencies: Test and refine AI model performance

title: Review the project requirements and plan
description: Thoroughly review the project's requirements, identify potential challenges and opportunities, and create a detailed development roadmap including milestones, timelines, and task delegation.
